location.Name: location
location.Description: Accepts a string for a specific tooth in the patient’s mouth. Format: “[Notation OID]|[tooth ID]”, where “Notation OID” is the OID matching the tooth notation system used to communicate the tooth ID. May send multiple entries separated by commas. Supported notations are Universal (94010), FDI (94011) and Palmer (94013). Ex. “urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.3.866976.94010|32”

morphology.Name: morphology
morphology.Description: Points a search to the correct subresource of tooth. Either “teeth” or “302214001” are accepted. These values are functionally equivalent.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Optional: Either the "patient" or the "subject" parameter is required.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Optional: Either the "patient" or the "subject" parameter is required.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

BodyStructure.Name: BodyStructure
BodyStructure.Description: An instance of the R4 BodyStructure resource.

active.Name: active
active.Description: True if the tooth is actively in a patient’s dentition. False if it has been removed.

dental-tooth-eruption-status.Name: extension
dental-tooth-eruption-status.Description: Tooth eruption status, including erupted, unerupted, partially erupted, and missing.

location.Name: location
location.Description: Returns the SNOMED mapping and Epic ID for the tooth.

morphology.Name: morphology
morphology.Description: Returns SNOMED code 302214001 or “Tooth” if SNOMED codes are not available.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: The patient whose tooth this is.
